footer.companyDescription: Premium electronics and technology solutions. Innovation and quality since 2010.

home.innovativeElectronics: Innovative Electronics for the Modern World
home.intelligentDevices: Intelligent Devices That Enhance Your Life

auth.enterCredentials: Please enter your credentials to access your account

validation.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.

forbidden.title: Access Forbidden
forbidden.description: You don't have permission to access this page.
forbidden.ifYouBelieveAccess: If you believe you should have access:

emailVerification.title: Email Verification
emailVerification.verifyingDescription: We're verifying your email address. This may take a moment...
emailVerification.verificationSuccessDescription: Your email has been verified successfully. You can now access all features of your account.
emailVerification.redirectingHome: Redirecting to home page in {{countdown}} seconds...
emailVerification.verificationErrorDescription: We couldn't verify your email. This could be due to an expired or invalid verification link.

myAccount.signInDescription: Access your personalized shopping experience with ease and elegance.
myAccount.createAccountDescription: Join our community and unlock exclusive benefits and personalized experiences.
myAccount.termsAgreement: By creating an account, you agree to our terms of service and privacy policy. Your personal data will be handled with the utmost care and security.
myAccount.benefit1: Expedited checkout process for seamless shopping
myAccount.benefit4: Complete purchase history and warranty tracking

login.success: Login successful! Redirecting to your account...
login.accountLocked: Account is locked. Please contact support.
login.tooManyAttempts: Too many login attempts. Please try again later.
login.emailNotVerified: Please verify your email address before logging in. Check your inbox for a verification link.
login.accountDisabled: Account is disabled. Please contact support.

registration.success: Registration successful! Please check your email for verification.
registration.emailAlreadyExists: An account with this email already exists
registration.weakPassword: Password is too weak. Please choose a stronger password.
registration.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
registration.termsNotAccepted: You must accept the terms and conditions
registration.verificationRequired: Please check your email to verify your account before logging in.

emailVerification.success: Email verified successfully! You can now log in to your account.
emailVerification.resendSuccess: Verification email sent successfully. Please check your inbox.

passwordReset.emailSent: Password reset email sent successfully. Please check your inbox.
passwordReset.emailFailed: Failed to send password reset email
passwordReset.resetSuccess: Password reset successfully. You can now log in with your new password.

general.serverError: Server error. Please try again later.
general.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.
general.unauthorized: You are not authorized to perform this action
general.validationError: Please check your input and try again
general.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please log in again.
general.maintenanceMode: System is under maintenance. Please try again later.
